vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.13
§ Machbanai = "bond of the Lord"
a Gadite and one of David's mighty warriors who joined him at Ziklag
vocabInfos._es_Definition: guerrero; tribu de Gad; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
末巴奈 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "主的聯繫"
一位在洗革拉投效大衛的迦得族的勇士 (代上12:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
末巴奈 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "主的联系"
一位在洗革拉投效大卫的迦得族的勇士 (代上12:13)
